description:
Hook up alt-d on linux.

Also clean up some accelerators.

BUG=10803


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=14123

messages.text:
http://codereview.chromium.org/90008/diff/1/2
File chrome/browser/gtk/browser_window_gtk.cc (left):

http://codereview.chromium.org/90008/diff/1/2#oldcode115
Line 115: { GDK_equal, IDC_ZOOM_PLUS, GDK_CONTROL_MASK },
I'm not sure why you took GDK_equal out.  Pressing ctrl-equal should zoom in as well.

On 2009/04/21 18:45:57, James Hawkins wrote:
> http://codereview.chromium.org/90008/diff/1/2
> File chrome/browser/gtk/browser_window_gtk.cc (left):
> 
> http://codereview.chromium.org/90008/diff/1/2#oldcode115
> Line 115: { GDK_equal, IDC_ZOOM_PLUS, GDK_CONTROL_MASK },
> I'm not sure why you took GDK_equal out.  Pressing ctrl-equal should zoom in as
> well.

The way I had it before was exactly the same behavior as Firefox Linux and Chrome Windows. Now I cannot zoom in without the keypad.

subject: Hook up alt-d on linux.
